description: This file defines a health check endpoint for a web application, utilizing Flask and Flask-Smorest, with a Blueprint named 'Health Check' that responds with a 'Healthy' message.

classes.name: HealthCheck
classes.description: A Flask MethodView that handles GET requests to return a health status message.

methods.name: get(self)
methods.description: Handles GET requests to the health check endpoint, returning a simple JSON message indicating health status.

ctags.name: blp
ctags.pattern: /^blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/

fields.name: blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/
